pageDesc: Force-directed graph of vendor and institution relationships. Search for any vendor or institution to build the graph around it. Click any node to explore its connections and detect co-bidding patterns.
searchPlaceholder: Search vendor or institution name to begin…
emptyDesc: AI-powered relationship mapping. Search any vendor or institution to build its 1st-degree network graph.
noConnections: No connections found for these filters.
clickNodeHint: Click any node to see its details and co-bidding relationships.
legendSizeNote: Node size = contract value · Edge width = contract count
